::: {.cell hash='2018-01_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_e83048d58b5f9a9ea40d3d125aa5b67b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)
dt <- fread("input.txt")
head(dt)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
    V1
1: -14
2:  15
3:   9
4:  19
5:  18
6:  14
```
:::
:::


## Part 1


::: {.cell hash='2018-01_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_153ae362528fb98dbbf4e205bb626860'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(dt$V1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 425
```
:::
:::


## Part 2


::: {.cell hash='2018-01_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a30d9789056c46932811a3b6d95b5231'}

```{.r .cell-code}
breakFlag <- FALSE
re_pete <- 1
while (!breakFlag) {
  vec <- cumsum(rep(dt$V1, re_pete))
  
  twice <- vec[duplicated(vec)]
  
  if (length(twice >= 1)) {
    print(twice[1])
    breakFlag <- TRUE
  } else {
    re_pete <- re_pete + 1
  }
}
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 57538
```
:::
:::
